segments.text: This kitchen is a total mess with water flooding everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing like some kind of plumbing nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in the puddle, drying a plate— how gross is that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's dripping down the cabinet doors, probably ruining the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on a stool, getting into the cookie jar like a little thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His feet are probably tracking dirt up there now with the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting with her hand out, encouraging this filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in an open cabinet— who knows how dusty they are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is sloppy and out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is neat, but inside it's disgusting chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing all this water waste and potential for mold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel she's using might get soaked in that spill soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is no way to keep a home clean.
segments.speaker: PAR
